JR Basic Calculator

A simple and efficient calculator Chrome extension designed to streamline your daily calculations. With a clean and intuitive interface, JR Basic Calculator allows you to perform basic arithmetic operations effortlessly. Whether you're calculating percentages, square roots, or basic mathematical expressions, this extension is your go-to tool for quick and accurate results. Enhance your productivity with JR Basic Calculator today!

Features:

Basic arithmetic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division)
Percentage calculation
Square root function
Clear entry and clear all functionalities for easy correction
History tracking for quick reference
Responsive to click inputs and number inputs from the keyboard
Install JR Basic Calculator now for free and simplify your mathematical tasks with ease!
